children.name: consent_not_given
children.label: We can't continue further without your consent to the previous questions.

children.name: consent_1
children.label: Have you been informed about how WFP will use your personal data, with whom it may be shared and how you can reach out to correct, update or erase your data? And if so, do you grant WFP permission to collect and store your personal data?

children.name: partners
children.label: Do you grant WFP permission to share your personal data with its partners, including humanitarian and/or private organisations, and/or the Government for the purpose that was explained to you?

children.name: consent_not_given
children.label: We can't continue further without your consent to the previous questions.
